detaileddescription.para: Set enabled/disabled state without recursion. Components in a disabled node become effectively disabled regardless of their own enable/disable state. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set enabled state on self and child nodes. Nodes' own enabled state is remembered (IsEnabledSelf) and can be restored.
Reset enabled state to the node's remembered state prior to calling SetDeepEnabled.
Set enabled state on self and child nodes. Unlike SetDeepEnabled this does not remember the nodes' own enabled state, but overwrites it.
